name: DefCon Crayon
description:
DefCon Crayon is a top down, isometric, twin stick shooter.  The player takes control of "the kid" who is being swarmed by his sisters somewhat sentient teddy bears. Blow them back or be hugged into OBLIVION.

OBJECTIVE:

Defend your sandpit from your kid sisters teddy bears. Blast through hordes that constantly swarm and aim for the highest score.

Mouse and Keyboard: WASD - Movement of Character Mouse Left Button - Shoot Mouse move - Change direction on where you are aiming OR Controller: Left Analog Stick - Movement Right Analog Stick - Directional Aim A - Select/Interact Right Button Top/R1 - Shoot

Don't forget to leave some feedback, and post your high scores if you played

Creators - MrIrelandish & Mashuun

Install Instructions: Extract .zip file, and run .exe file. If the .exe is not there, check your antivirus software Note: No Mac Installer
